DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Recurrent Disease Status Date Known Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes if the recurrent disease date was known or unknown.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Recurrent Disease Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The return of a disease after a period of remission._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: the return of a sign, symptom, or disease after a remission.:A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.
A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge._Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

Concepts.definition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.:Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
